charts.name: collection-management-operators
charts.description: Collection of management Operators which are required as a dependency for other services, such as Logging, Loki, NetObserv etc. It simply calls helper-operator to deploy all required operators without any configuration of a CRD.

charts.name: helper-proj-onboarding
charts.description: This Chart shall deploy namespaces and their depending resources, like NetworkPolicies or Quotas etc.

charts.name: rh-build-of-opentelemetry
charts.description: Configure Red Hat Build of OpenTelemetry Operator resources (Collector, Instrumentation, TargetAllocator).

charts.name: tempo-tracing
charts.description: Configure the Tempo Operator (distributed tracing).

charts.name: minio-configurator
charts.description: A Chart to automate the bucket creation and configuration for MINIO Object Storage

charts.name: openshift-gitops
charts.description: Installs and patches the Red Hat Openshift Gitops Operator

charts.name: collection-optional-operators
charts.description: Collection of optional operators, like CodeReadyWorkspaces without any configuration of a CRD.

charts.name: collection-operators
charts.description: Collection of Operators which can be deployed on Demo Systems without any configuration of a CRD.

charts.name: helper-lokistack
charts.description: The only purpose of this helper chart is to provide a template for the LokiStack Custom Resource, so it must not be re-defined for multiple services.

charts.name: openshift-logging
charts.description: Deploy and configure OpenShift Logging based on LokiStack

charts.name: helper-odf-bucket-secret
charts.description: Some services like Tempo require a secret with a specifc key for the object sotrage. When a S3 bucket is created via OpenShift Data Foundation, then this chart will help to generate a correct secret. (This is an evolution of helper-loki-bucket-secret)

charts.name: update-clusterversion
charts.description: A Helm chart to update OpenShift ClusterVersion

charts.name: helper-operator
charts.description: A helper Chart to reduce code repetition. This Chart should be called as a dependency by other charts in order to install Operators.

charts.name: sealed-secrets
charts.description: A Helm chart to deploy sealed-secrets - depends on Bitnami's helm chart

charts.name: tpl
charts.description: A library that shall collect certain templates to reuse them among different charts.

charts.name: etcd-backup
charts.description: Create a CronJob that performs ETCD Backup and stores the backup to a PV.

charts.name: trusted-artifact-signer
charts.description: Configure Trusted Artifact Signer

charts.name: quay-registry-setup
charts.description: Deploy and configure Red Hat Quay Registry.

charts.name: sonarqube
charts.description: A Helm chart to deploy sonarqube community edition -d epends on Sonarcube's helm chart

charts.name: compliance-operator-full-stack
charts.description: Master chart to deploy and configure the Compliance Operator

charts.name: helm-policy-generator
charts.description: This Chart shall help to generate policies for Advanced Cluster Management

charts.name: generic-cluster-config
charts.description: This Chart is responsible for deploying generic cluster configuration, for example, etcd encryption, OAuth etc.

charts.name: rhacs-setup
charts.description: Master chart to deploy RHACS operator, initialize it and do some configuration using API Calls

charts.name: openshift-virtualization
charts.description: Configure the operator Openshift Virtualization (HyperConverged and HostPath Provisioner)

charts.name: setup-container-security-operator
charts.description: Setup the Quay Container Security Operator.

charts.name: rhacs-backup
charts.description: Chart to create a CronJoc to backup Advanced Cluster Security for Kubernetes to a PerstistentVolume.

charts.name: rhacm-setup
charts.description: Setup and configure Advanced Cluster Managerment. Replaces the Chart rhacm-full-stack.

charts.name: rh-build-keycloak
charts.description: Configure the operator Red Hat Build of Keycloak

charts.name: pipeline-example
charts.description: Create an example Pipeline which does a linting of openshift-clusterconfig-gitops using kubelinter, yamllin, yamlscore ....

charts.name: openshift-data-foundation
charts.description: Deploys and configures the OpenShift Data Foundation Operator.

charts.name: network-observability
charts.description: Installs and configures OpenShift Network Observability Operator.

charts.name: ingresscontroller
charts.description: Configures the IngressController object.

charts.name: helper-status-checker
charts.description: A helper Chart that creates a job to verify if the deployments of an operator are running. To do so it creates a service account with a role to read the status of the Deployments.

charts.name: helper-server-side-apply
charts.description: Using Server Side Apply to create for example node labelling, requires openshift-gitops 1.6+

charts.name: helper-objectstore
charts.description: A helper Chart to create BackingStore, BackingClass, BucketClaim and StorageClass objects, when ODF is used. Currently type PV is supported only (Creating a local Persistent Volume-backed backingstore)!

charts.name: helper-loki-bucket-secret
charts.description: Loki requires a secret with specific keys. This Chart creates a Job that will create such a secret based on the OpenShift Data Foundation BucketClaim.

charts.name: helper-argocd
charts.description: Takes care of creation of Applications, Appprojects and ApplicationSets (supporting different generators)

charts.name: file-integrity-operator
charts.description: Setup the FileIntegrity Operator (based on AIDE)

charts.name: cyclonedx
charts.description: A Helm chart to deploy CycloneDX to generate SBOM

charts.name: cost-management
charts.description: Setup and configure cost-management Operator

charts.name: cert-manager
charts.description: Install and configure the Cert-Manager

charts.name: admin-networkpolicies
charts.description: Configure AdminNetworkPolicy and BaselineNetworkPolicy resources for a cluster.

charts.name: rhacs-demo-applications
charts.description: Deploy a demo application with known SECURITY RISKS!!! Used for RHACS Demos
